Vehicle.Name: The Broken Horn
Vehicle.Description: [H3]The [I]Broken Horn[i][h3] This C-ROC [I]Gozanti[i]-class cruiser serves as Vizago's personal transport. It is only lightly armored, relying on surprising speed and maneuverability to avoid trouble. The [I]Broken Horn[i] has several modifications, including smuggling compartments and power stations for up to a dozen droids, all of which are keyed to Vizago's droid remote for activation at a moment's notice. The ship's extensive reconfiguration allows the Devaronian to fly the ship without the aid of a co-pilot, if necessary.
Vehicle.Crew: One pilot, up to 25 hired crew.
